title: Implement type class resolution and dictionary passing
body:
Extend the type inference engine with type class support and implement dictionary-passing translation.

**Deliverables:**
- Class environment: store class declarations (superclasses, methods, default methods)
- Instance environment: store instance declarations
- Constraint solving: given `Eq a` constraint, find the right instance
- Dictionary-passing translation: translate type class constraints into explicit dictionary arguments in Core
  - `show x` where `x :: a, Show a` becomes `show showDict x`
- Handle superclass constraints: `Ord a` implies `Eq a`
- Emit diagnostics for: missing instances, ambiguous types, overlapping instances
- Unit tests for class resolution and dictionary translation

**Design notes:**
- This is the standard Wadler-Blott dictionary-passing approach
- Single-parameter type classes only for now
- Stock deriving (Show, Eq, Ord, Read) generates instance declarations in the desugarer (05-05)
